headline: Mendenhall Glacier Ice Adventure
short_description: Explore the legendary Mendenhall Glacier with expert guides and experience ice caves, crevasses, and unreal blue formations.

headline: Juneau Whale Watching Quest
short_description: Cruise through Auke Bay in search of humpback and orca whales with guaranteed sightings.

headline: Mount Roberts Tram & Nature Walk
short_description: Ride the iconic tramway for stunning views and enjoy a peaceful alpine nature hike.

headline: Juneau Dog Sledding Helicopter Excursion
short_description: Fly over breathtaking glaciers and land on a snowfield to meet real racing sled dogs.

headline: Mendenhall Lake Kayak Expedition
short_description: Paddle across a glacier-fed lake for close-up views of icebergs and dramatic mountain walls.

headline: Juneau Food & Craft Beer Walking Tour
short_description: Taste Alaska’s best seafood, local brews, and handmade chocolates on a relaxed walking tour.

headline: Inside Passage Scenic Flight
short_description: Take an unforgettable small-plane flight over fjords, glaciers, and unspoiled wilderness.

headline: Juneau Salmon Fishing Charter
short_description: Join a professional captain for a salmon fishing trip through rich coastal waters.

headline: Gold Creek Salmon Bake Experience
short_description: Enjoy all-you-can-eat wild Alaska salmon in a stunning rainforest setting with live music.

headline: Historic Juneau Mining Adventure
short_description: Pan for gold, explore authentic mining ruins, and learn the history of Alaska’s gold rush.
